hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I like it a lot gorilla.clinic I know you cannot ban teenagers from computers because now they must have access to the internet to do their homework. How they ever get said homework done, I do not know. But, in addition to the distraction factor is the danger factor. Children and teenagers should not be left in their bedroom with a computer for hours on end on their own. Sadly, you might as well put them in a room full of paedophiles.
